WorkItem.ClosedComment: 4.1.05 Released. If this is still an issue, please reopen with exact steps to reproduce and any necessary character files
WorkItem.Description:
So i downloaded 4.1.04 and at first i thought it crashes whenever i use *import from battle.net*. Then i tried to load another char and that worked. So problem is when i try to import my paladin via battle.net it crashes with windows saying it's sorry blabla. What may cause this?
Â 
Tried it on different computers with xp and win 7 and it only happens on my char. - Santhoi in Frostwhisper server.   What i think is that downloading from battle.net isn't the problem but loading something in that info makes the program crash. Maybe an item that is not in the list or something similar.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Importing Paladin causes Cannot Respond Crash

Comments.Message: The (european?) battle.net was updated last night (with a lot of bugs) and since then Rawr crashes (it worked yesterday!).
I just updated the importing server, does this still happen now?
Yeap just tried and crash. Also tried another paladin and that works too.. seems like it's only my main char causing this still.
The problem is not that i can't use rawr, i can make my char in rawr without importing and use. But there surely is a problem here and should be fixed for the good of Rawr.

Ahhhhhh, ok, I get it
It can't determine your professions, so it's failing on the fact that you have a blacksmithing socket on your Hands without having the profession and gets stuck in a loop of turning it on because you have it and turning it off because of lack of profession. Lemme track this in the Importing Server to see if I can make it read your professions correctly
Another new server published, try now
Yup that last update did the trick :). What an akward loop that is, i almost feel special for having it. Thanks for the fast fix Jothay, as usual.
BTW didn't want to just open another topic for this - steelskin says 300 stamina should be 450 now. (Ignore this if its only tooltip [when i mouse over it said 300] error.)
The flask has already had an update for next version
Alright then this issue is fixed. Thank you again.
